title: Downtown Cincinnati Historic Haven with Onsite Museum, Restaurant & Spa
description:
Step into a world where contemporary art and historic architecture meet in the heart of downtown Cincinnati, just steps from the Aronoff Center for the Arts and the bustling Over-the-Rhine neighbourhood. Each room is adorned with original artworks, while the onsite 21c Museum offers ever-changing exhibitions open day and night.

Dine at Metropole, where wood-fired dishes showcase local ingredients in a chic, gallery-inspired setting. Explore nearby Findlay Market, the cityâ€™s oldest public market, or stroll to Washington Park for live music and cultural events. Back at the hotel, retreat to The Spa at 21c Cincinnati for soothing massages and facials.
